modName: Boom Head shot - FPS Doug Sound replacer
summary: This mod replaces a number of sounds with some of FPS Doug's iconic phrases.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the sneak attack sound (with Boom Headshot), the skill level up sound (with DOPAH YEAH!), and the music played whenever the player dies (with Doug's raging).

Video demonstration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=381DGK5DvYo&feature=youtu.be


To install put the data folder inside the skyrim folder

to uninstall simply delete the files 
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_01
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_02
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_03
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_04
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_05
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_06
data\music\special\failure\mus_failure_07
data\sound\fx\ui\ui_skill_increase
data\sound\fx\ui\ui_sneakattack_01

The sounds used in this mod are taken from the Pure Pwnage internet series.
author: RuffinVangarr
